metadata.title: CVE-2021-24002 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When a user clicked on an FTP URL containing encoded newline characters(%0A and %0D), the newlines would have been interpreted as such and allowedarbitrary commands to be sent to the FTP server. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 78.10, Thunderbird < 78.10, and Firefox < 88.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
